comments.body: Same for giant mushrooms in the overworld!

Yes please! Also, they should be replaced when newly grown nether trees try to occupy the same space similar to how all other leaf types are replaced by newly grown wood. In both cases the current functionally makes it incredibly annoying to farm them because they all must be harvested by hand before you can grow new nether trees in the same area.
Also, while we are at it, growing them should not convert the block below back to regular netherack meaning you need to bonemeal to regrow the nyleum.
You can create an infinite water source by making a 2x2 square of water.  Although this sounds cool i dont think it would be practical because its so easy to get water

I really hope this gets added, it would make crafting so much faster. Especially recipes that include non-stackables (Such as dispensers)

We need this. Brilliant solution!
I didn't even know you could refill the selected trade with villagers until now - there's no reason it shouldn't be a shortcut with the recipe book too, if the function is already in the game for a similar UI.
It seams intuitive for the crafting table to work like villager trading. When your out of the resources, space should reload the table.
Great QOL improvement!
Please add this.. I press spacebar all the time while crafting and am constantly sad that it doesn't work. :'(
I was trying to find the exact snapshot, but this has been added in 1.20.x or 1.21.x.  Not sure which major version.

For everyone who doesnt know, this is already in the game.
If you use the recipe book in the crafting table and click on a recipe, THEN you can press space bar to refill it just like with the villager trading.
Yea this bums me out... I just bought a keyboard and mouse worth $100 because I got excited to use it on Minecraft only to find out it dosen‚Äôt work!
Pls add it what‚Äôs the point of adding the keyboard and mouse settings when u can‚Äôt even use the Bluetooth keyboard and Bluetooth mouse on it it would mean alot
Same, I bought Minecraft on my iPad specifically for this, I‚Äôm going to get a refund until they add Bluetooth keyboard support

I don't think apple has support for Keyboard and Mouse gaming. Apple made it where you can only use a keyboard to type, but a keyboard still acts like it would on a computer if you're playing something on safari. About mouse controls, for the most part, it only sends touchscreen inputs, but you can still hover with your pointer on safari. So even though you probably won't be able to use a keyboard and mouse on downloaded games, give it a try on web games like paper Minecraft, or wait for apple to add it sometime, so don't blame Mojang or Microsoft.
Damn I bought an expensive iPad case to try BE and it is not fun because I can‚Äôt even use a mouse

I've been playing this game over 16 years. I don't want to HAVE TO type the way someone else wants me to on my own server. Anyone can report me for playing on my own expensive hosted server. I've put YEARS of my life into this server and playing around with friends, and friends of friends, and anyone else who wanted to join.

We aren't politically correct, nor am I. If people don't like it they can literally 'DISCONNECT'. But they do like it, it's freedom -- Minecraft 1.19.1+ isn't. Values are, and have been different, on every other server. Even if this feature works on Bedrock it doesn't on Java.

No, guys, I don't know if you know, but wardens react to vibrations not sound, and years of adapting to the deep dark where little things spawn, they won't dance and let their meal escape.

I'm hoping they'll have something special for if you watch through a Warden's 'eyes' in spectator mode. Since there's already something special if you use creepers, spiders or endermen, the fact that the Warden can't see normally would probably call for something like that. Maybe it just makes you get a black screen, or maybe it's something else like an emboss or threshold filter.

398419756191 a bastion remnant is a new structure coming in the 1.16 Nether Update, which houses piglins, a mob coming in 1.16.
I like this idea. It gives a sense of purpose to visit these buildings. I don‚Äôt think a lot of people would visit them normally so it gives a drive to keep searching for these special buildings.

Here is how i would change the suggestion:

+1 attack reach per level is too op, so replace it with +2 damage for a reason for it to replace sharpness.

It could have a max level of 5 like sharpness, smite, and bane of arthropods.

It should be able to be enchanted on all swords, not just netherite since that is how enchants work in the game currently.

Moved to proper category.

Clarified subject to help search results.

How about bringing back the rumbling of thunder too. Not just lightning.

This sounds awesome, I would add that gold items should have only one more level added on and level six unbreaking would be unlocked after applying the hardness enchantment an enchantment which can only be found or traded, not ceated. I suggest the one level increase because unlimited levels is something you could do in a mod but just wouldn't fit into vanilla Minecraft. Maybe limits on how many levels can be added should be a command, like /enchlim <tileName> [true/false].

Fantastic idea! I was just thinking about posting something like this. Gold really should be a more useful resource and adding more differences between tiers of armor/weapons/tools would make the game more interesting.
